texts.title: Greetings and Introductions
texts.content: Este é o texto para aprender cumprimentos e introduções em inglês.

texts.title: My Daily Routine
texts.paragraph1: I wake up at 7:00 AM every morning. First, I brush my teeth and wash my face. Then, I have breakfast. I usually eat cereal and drink orange juice.
texts.paragraph2: After breakfast, I get dressed for the day. I put on my school uniform because I go to school. My school starts at 8:30 AM, so I have to leave home early.
texts.paragraph3: At school, I study different subjects like math, English, and science. I have lunch with my friends in the school cafeteria. After school, I like to play soccer with my friends in the park.
texts.paragraph4: In the evening, I do my homework. It's important to finish my homework before dinner. After that, I have dinner with my family. We talk about our day and share stories.
texts.paragraph5: Before bed, I read a book for a little while. It helps me relax. Then, I go to sleep around 9:00 PM. That's my daily routine!
